articles.title: Trump emerges from seclusion to denounce Fauci, China and dangle 2024 rerun - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Trump joined a chorus of Republican politicians who are criticising Fauci for asking Americans to wear masks to guard against the virus.
articles.content: Greenville, North Carolina: Former president Donald Trump has sharply attacked US infectious disease expert Anthony Fauci over his handling of the coronavirus pandemic, demanded reparations from Chin… [+1731 chars]

articles.author: ABS-CBN News
articles.title: Golf: PH’s Saso yields lead at US Women’s Open, but still in title pursuit - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: Yuka Saso struggled with 3 bogeys in the final 6 holes to finish at 6-under 207 after 3 rounds on Saturday, one shot behind leader American Lexi Thompson.
articles.content:
Yuka Saso of the Philippines relinquished her hold of the lead at the US Women's Open on Saturday, but remained very much on course to achieve history for her country.
Saso staved off American Lexi … [+2306 chars]

articles.title: US begins reopening as Covid-19 cases decline: Live updates - CNN
articles.description: About half of Americans having received at least one dose of a Covid-19 vaccine as more coronavirus mandates and restrictions ease. Follow here for the latest.

articles.title: US "Suppressing" Chinese Firms: Beijing On Joe Biden's Investment Ban List - NDTV
articles.description: Beijing accused the United States of "suppressing" Chinese firms and issued veiled threats of a retaliation Friday, after President Joe Biden expanded a blacklist of companies Americans are barred from investing in.
articles.content:
China decried the US' blacklist move as a "violation of market law" (File).
